text: Joël Robert (26 November 1943 – 13 January 2021) was a Belgian professional motocross racer. He was one of the most successful motocross racers competing in the Motocross World Championships during the 1960s and early 1970s. Robert died on 13 January 2021 in Gilly, Belgium, aged 77.Belgische motorcrosslegende Joël Robert (77) is overleden sporza.be, 13 January 2021, article in Dutch He was in a coma after having a heart attack while being treated with COVID-19.Joël Robert (77) overleden: België moet afscheid nemen van een motorcrosslegende ==References== Category:1943 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Motorcycle racers Category:Belgian sportspeople Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Belgium
title: Joël Robert
